00047 using namespace Hypertable;
00048 using namespace Hypertable::Config;
00049 using namespace std;

00051 
00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   const char *usage =
00055     "Usage: random_read_test [options] <total-bytes>\n\n"
00056     "Description:\n"
00057     "  This program is meant to be used in conjunction with random_write_test.\n"
00058     "  It will generate and lookup the same sequence of keys as random_write_test\n"
00059     "  as long as the <total-bytes> value is the same.  It expects to find exactly\n"
00060     "  one entry for each key.  If it encounters a key that comes up empty or returns\n"
00061     "  more than one entry, it prints an error message and exit with a return status\n"
00062     "  of 1, otherwise it displays timing statistics and exits with status 0.\n\n"
00063     "Options";
00064 
00065   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00066     static void init_options() {
00067       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00068         ("blocksize", i32()->default_value(1000), "Size of value to write")
00069         ("checksum-file", str(), "File to contain, for each insert, "
00070             "key '\t' <value-checksum> pairs")
00071         ("seed", i32()->default_value(1234), "Random number generator seed")
00072         ("max-keys", i32()->default_value(0), "Maximum number of keys to lookup")
00073         ;
00074       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("total-bytes", i64(), "");
00075       cmdline_positional_desc().add("total-bytes", -1);
00076     }
00077   };
00078 }
00079 
00080 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00081 
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00084   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00085   TablePtr table_ptr;
00086   ScanSpecBuilder scan_spec;
00087   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00088   Cell cell;
00089   size_t blocksize;
00090   uint64_t total = 0;
00091   unsigned long seed;
00092   String config_file;
00093   bool write_checksums = false;
00094   uint32_t checksum;
00095   ofstream checksum_out;
00096   uint32_t max_keys;
00097   size_t R;
00098 
00099   try {
00100     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00101 
00102     if (has("checksum-file")) {
00103       checksum_out.open(get_str("checksum-file").c_str());
00104       write_checksums = true;
00105     }
00106     blocksize = get_i32("blocksize");
00107     seed = get_i32("seed");
00108     total = get_i64("total-bytes");
00109     max_keys = get_i32("max-keys");
00110 
00111     Random::seed(seed);
00112 
00113     R = total / blocksize;
00114 
00115     if (max_keys != 0 && max_keys < R)
00116       R = max_keys;
00117 
00118     if (config_file != "")
00119       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(
00120           System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]), config_file);
00121     else
00122       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(
00123           System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00124 
00125     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("RandomTest");
00126 
00127   }
00128   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00129     cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00130     _exit(1);
00131   }
00132 
00133   char key_data[32];
00134 
00135   key_data[12] = '\0';  // Row key: a random 12-digit number.
00136 
00137   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00138 
00139   {
00140     boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00141 
00142     try {
00143 
00144       for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00145 
00146         Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(key_data, 12);
00147 
00148         scan_spec.clear();
00149         scan_spec.add_column("Field");
00150         scan_spec.add_row(key_data);
00151 
00152         TableScanner *scanner_ptr=table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec.get());
00153         int n = 0;
00154         while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00155           if (write_checksums) {
00156             checksum = fletcher32(cell.value, cell.value_len);
00157             checksum_out << key_data << "\t" << checksum << "\n";
00158           }
00159           ++n;
00160         }
00161         if (n != 1) {
00162           printf("Wrong number of results: %d (key=%s, i=%d)\n",
00163                  n, key_data, (int)i);
00164           HT_ERROR_OUT << "Wrong number of results: " << n
00165               << " (key=" << key_data << ", i=" << i << ")" << HT_END;
00166           _exit(1);
00167         }
00168         delete scanner_ptr;
00169 
00170         progress_meter += 1;
00171       }
00172 
00173     }
00174     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00175       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00176       _exit(1);
00177     }
00178   }
00179 
00180   stopwatch.stop();
00181 
00182   if (write_checksums)
00183     checksum_out.close();
00184 
00185   double total_read = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00186 
00187   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00188   printf(" Total scanned:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00189   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00190          total_read / stopwatch.elapsed());
00191   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f scanned cells/s\n",
00192          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00193   fflush(stdout);
00194   _exit(0); // don't bother with static objects.
00195 }
